title: India's plan to link fast payments like UPI draws cautious, guarded response from Fed
description: The United States has expressed concerns about linking domestic fast payment systems like India's UPI for faster global transactions. Federal Reserve's Christopher J. Waller mentioned the trade-offs and increased risk management burdens such interlinking could cause for banks.
